title: 正版账号被收回QAQ
author: 萌萌苦力怕
txt_content:
昨天下午15:17分，我收到了来自mojang的邮件
内容：
Order CancellationOrder ID: #ee4d51860fdf44f1b19ff7a1e6d9095a
Hi,This is a cancellation notice for your previous order #ee4d51860fdf44f1b19ff7a1e6d9095a.Why was my order canceled?Most likely we have received a refund or void request. If you did not issue such a request yourself, or believe that it was done in error, contact us through our support center.What will happen to my game/gift code?If you bought a game, the created game profile will be deleted and you will no longer be able to play the game.If you bought a gift code, the gift code will be revoked. If the code already has been redeemed, the created game profile will be deleted, and the person who redeemed the code will no longer be able to play the game.If you have any further questions or want to learn more about our refund policies, visit our support center.Best regards,
Mojang.翻译：订单取消
订单ID:# ee4d51860fdf44f1b19ff7a1e6d9095a你好,
这是你以前的订单取消通知# ee4d51860fdf44f1b19ff7a1e6d9095a。
为什么我的订单被取消?
很有可能我们已经收到退款或无效的请求。如果你没有问题这一请求自己,或认为它是错误,我们通过支持中心联系。
我的游戏/礼物代码会发生什么?
如果你买了一个游戏,游戏创建概要文件将被删除,你将不再能够玩游戏。
代码如果你买了一份礼物,这份礼物将被吊销。如果代码已经赎回,创建的游戏配置文件将被删除,和救赎的代码的人将不再能够玩游戏。
如果你有任何进一步的问题或想了解更多关于我们的退款政策,访问我们的支持中心。
最好的问候,Mojang。
谁能告诉我这是为什么啊QAQ然后这要怎么解决啊QAQ求大神告诉我QAQ
